item.title: 中日韩同意加强三边关系并寻求峰会
item.description:
The foreign ministers of China, Japan and South Korea agreed on Sunday to restart cooperation among the Asian neighbours and pave the way for a summit of their three leaders in the latest move to ease tensions in the vital region.翻译:中国、日本和韩国外长周日同意重启亚洲邻国之间的合作，并为三位领导人峰会铺平道路，这是缓解这一重要地区紧张局势的最新举措。

Even as China and the United States mend frayed ties, including a summit this month between Presidents Xi Jinping and Joe Biden, Beijing is concerned that Washington and its key regional allies are strengthening their three-way partnership.翻译:尽管中美两国正在修复紧张的关系，包括本月习近平主席和拜登总统举行峰会，但北京仍担心华盛顿及其主要地区盟友正在加强三方伙伴关系。

Beijing, Seoul and Tokyo had agreed on annual summits from 2008 to bolster diplomatic and economic exchanges, but two-way rows and the COVID-19 pandemic interrupted the plan, with the three leaders last meeting in 2019.翻译:北京、首尔和东京已同意从 2008 年起每年举行峰会，以加强外交和经济交流，但双向争吵和新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行打乱了这一计划，三位领导人上次会晤是在 2019 年。

The three top diplomats met in the South Korean port of Busan for their first such meeting since 2019, after officials of the three countries agreed in September to arrange a trilateral summit at the "earliest convenient time".翻译:三位高级外交官在韩国釜山港会面，这是自 2019 年以来的首次此类会晤。此前，这三个国家的官员于 9 月同意在“尽早方便的时间”安排举行三边峰会。

The three ministers did not specify a timeframe for the trilateral summit.翻译:三位部长没有具体说明三边峰会的时间表。

China's Xi, Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida and South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol may not be able to meet this year, but their summit is likely in the near future, South Korea's national security advisor Cho Tae-yong told Yonhap news TV.翻译:韩国国家安全顾问赵泰勇告诉韩联社新闻电视台，中国国家主席习近平、日本首相岸田文雄和韩国总统尹锡烈今年可能无法会面，但他们的峰会很可能在不久的将来举行。

The ministers agreed in their 100-minute talks to advance cooperation in six areas, including security, economy and technology, and promote concrete discussions to prepare for the summit, Japan's foreign ministry said in a statement.翻译:日本外务省在一份声明中表示，部长们在100分钟的会谈中同意推进安全、经济和技术等六个领域的合作，并推动具体讨论，为峰会做准备。

South Korean Foreign Minister Park Jin, who was also concerned about North Korean issues, told his counterparts it was "important to further institutionalise trilateral cooperation so that it will develop into a stable and sustainable system", his ministry said in a statement.翻译:韩国外交部在一份声明中表示，同样担心朝鲜问题的韩国外交部长朴镇告诉外长，“进一步将三边合作制度化，使其发展成为一个稳定和可持续的体系非常重要”。

China's Wang Yi said the three countries should play an active role in promoting regional and global development with a "more progressive manner and attitude."翻译:中国王毅表示，这三个国家应该以“更加进步的方式和态度”在促进地区和全球发展中发挥积极作用。

Japan's Yoko Kamikawa said greater trilateral cooperation would contribute to regional peace as the international security situation has become "more severe and complex than ever."翻译:日本的上川洋子表示，随着国际安全局势变得“比以往任何时候都更加严峻和复杂”，加强三边合作将有助于地区和平。

In bilateral talks, Park and Kamikawa condemned North Korea's launch last week of its first spy satellite and agreed to boost responses to arms deals between Pyongyang and Moscow, Seoul's foreign ministry said in a statement.翻译:首尔外交部在一份声明中表示，在双边会谈中，朴槿惠和上川谴责朝鲜上周发射第一颗间谍卫星，并同意加强对平壤与莫斯科之间武器交易的回应。

Marring the co-operative tone, Kamikawa described as "extremely regrettable" a South Korean court's order for Japan to compensate a group of women forced to work in its wartime brothels and asked Seoul to take appropriate measures, Japan's Kyodo news agency said.翻译:日本共同社称，与合作的语气不同，上川称韩国法院命令日本赔偿一群被迫在战时妓院工作的妇女“极其令人遗憾”，并要求首尔采取适当措施。

Park, meeting separately with China's Wang, invited him to visit Seoul, and they agreed to reinforce strategic communications, Seoul said. Park asked for China to play a constructive role in encouraging North Korea to avoid further provocations and take the path toward denuclearisation.翻译:首尔表示，朴槿惠分别会见了中国国家主席王毅，邀请他访问首尔，双方同意加强战略沟通。朴槿惠要求中国发挥建设性作用，鼓励朝鲜避免进一步挑衅，走无核化道路。

Beijing's foreign ministry said Wang warned Park not to politicise economic and technology issues, amid China-U.S. tension over semiconductors and other trade disputes.翻译:北京外交部表示，王警告朴槿惠不要将经济和技术问题政治化，因为中美在半导体和其他贸易争端方面关系紧张。

Kamikawa, meeting Wang on Saturday, expressed hopes for a security dialogue between Tokyo and Beijing "in the near future". Wang highlighted the need for China and Japan to ensure they "do not pose a threat" to each another and respect the legitimate concerns of each, Beijing said.翻译:上川在周六会见王时表示，希望东京和北京“在不久的将来”进行安全对话。北京表示，王强调中日两国需要确保彼此“不构成威胁”，并尊重各自的合理关切。

South Korea's Yoon and Japan's Kishida have moved to mend ties frayed by history and trade feuds, holding a historic three-way summit in August with Biden.翻译:韩国的尹恩惠和日本的岸田已采取行动，修复因历史和贸易争端而破裂的关系，并于八月与拜登举行了历史性的三方峰会。

In July, Wang warned that U.S. efforts to strengthen ties with Seoul and Tokyo could fan regional tension and spark confrontation.翻译:7月，王警告称，美国加强与首尔和东京关系的努力可能会加剧地区紧张局势并引发对抗。

item.title: 华为将智能汽车业务转移至与长安的新合资公司
item.description:
China's Huawei (HWT.UL) said on Sunday it will move core technologies and resources in its smart car unit, which has chalked up robust sales for a number of new vehicles, to a new joint company owned up to 40% by automaker Changan Auto.翻译:中国华为 (HWT.UL) 周日表示，将把其智能汽车部门的核心技术和资源转移给一家新的合资公司，该公司的多款新车销量强劲，而该公司由汽车制造商长安汽车持股 40% 。

The new company will engage in research and development, production, sales and service of intelligent automotive systems and component solutions, Huawei said in a press release.翻译:华为在新闻稿中表示，新公司将从事智能汽车系统和零部件解决方案的研发、生产、销售和服务。

"The new company will ... work with partners to promote innovation and leadership in smart car technology and promote the prosperity and development of the automotive industry," the release said.翻译:新闻稿称：“新公司将……与合作伙伴共同推动智能汽车技术的创新和领先地位，促进汽车行业的繁荣和发展。”

The equity ratio and amount of capital contributed will be negotiated by the two parties, Chongqing Changan Automobile (000625.SZ) said in a filing with the Shenzhen Stock Exchange on Sunday.翻译:重庆长安汽车（000625.SZ）周日在向深圳证券交易所提交的文件中表示，股权比例和出资额将由双方协商确定。

"The two parties will jointly support the target company to become an industry leader in automotive intelligent systems and component solutions based in China," the filing said.翻译:文件称：“双方将共同支持目标公司成为中国汽车智能系统和零部件解决方案的行业领导者。”

Huawei managing director and chairman of the smart car solutions unit Yu Chengdong said at a signing ceremony in Shenzhen that the smartphone manufacturer would work with more auto firms to "seize the opportunities of the electrification and intelligent transformation of the auto industry," the press release said.翻译:华为董事总经理兼智能汽车解决方案部门董事长余承东在深圳举行的签约仪式上表示，华为将与更多汽车企业合作，“抓住汽车行业电气化、智能化转型的机遇”。说。

Huawei has repeatedly said it does not make cars on its own but only helps other automakers make better vehicles.翻译:华为多次表示，它不自己生产汽车，只是帮助其他汽车制造商生产更好的汽车。

It has an existing partnership with Changan as well as other companies, including Seres Group (601127.SS). Huawei and Seres jointly produce Aito branded cars, including the M7 model.翻译:它与长安汽车以及塞雷斯集团（601127.SS）等其他公司建立了现有合作伙伴关系。华为与Seres联合生产Aito品牌汽车，包括M7车型。

Huawei has also built the S7 sedan with Chinese automaker Chery under a new marquee, Luxeed, that it intends to position as a competitor to Tesla's Model S.翻译:华为还与中国汽车制造商奇瑞在新品牌 Luxeed 下生产 S7 轿车，打算将其定位为特斯拉 Model S 的竞争对手。

Huawei said in October it had received more than 50,000 orders for its revamped M7 model during the first 25 days of sales, which would put Aito among China's five top-selling new energy vehicle manufacturers based on August data.翻译:华为10月份表示，其改款M7车型在销售的前25天内已收到超过5万份订单，根据8月份的数据，这将使Aito跻身中国最畅销的五家新能源汽车制造商之列。

Reporting by Laurie Chen and Beijing Newsroom; Additional reporting by Brenda Goh in Shanghai; Editing by Edmund Klamann翻译:Laurie Chen 和北京新闻编辑室的报道； Brenda Goh 在上海的补充报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼

item.title: 马尼拉称中国战斗机“绕行”菲律宾巡逻机
item.description:
Two Chinese fighter jets were monitored "orbiting" a Philippine aircraft participating in patrols with Australia in the South China Sea but did not cause any untoward incident, Manila said on Sunday.翻译:马尼拉周日表示，两架中国战斗机在南海与澳大利亚一起巡逻时被监测到“绕行”一架菲律宾飞机，但没有造成任何不幸事件。

The militaries of the Philippines and Australia carried out a second day of sea and air exercises in the Southeast Asian country's exclusive economic zone, days after Manila held patrols with the U.S. as Pacific nations warily eye an increasingly assertive China.翻译:菲律宾和澳大利亚军队在这个东南亚国家的专属经济区进行了第二天的海上和空中演习，几天前，马尼拉与美国进行了巡逻，太平洋国家警惕地注视着日益自信的中国。

China claims almost the entire South China Sea, a conduit for more than $3 trillion of annual ship-borne commerce, including parts claimed by the Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，南海是每年超过 3 万亿美元的船运贸易的通道，其中包括菲律宾、越南、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和文莱声称拥有主权的部分地区。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

The Philippines is ramping up efforts to counter what it describes as China's "aggressive activities" in the South China Sea, which has also become a flashpoint for Chinese and U.S. tensions around naval operations.翻译:菲律宾正在加大力度反击其所称的中国在南海的“侵略活动”，南海也成为中美围绕海军行动紧张关系的导火索。

China has accused the Philippines of enlisting "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea and stirring up trouble.翻译:中国指责菲律宾招募“外国势力”在南海巡逻并煽动事端。

"It was confirmed as per reports received that two Chinese fighter jets were monitored orbiting the Philippines' A-29B Super Tucano at the vicinity of Hubo Reef in the West Philippine Sea," Xerxes Trinidad, chief of the Philippine military's public affairs office said.翻译:菲律宾军方公共事务办公室主任薛西斯·特立尼达表示：“据收到的报告证实，两架中国战斗机在西菲律宾海呼波礁附近监测到菲律宾A-29B超级巨嘴鸟飞机绕行飞行。”

The West Philippine Sea is Manila's term for waters in the South China Sea that fall within its exclusive economic zone.翻译:西菲律宾海是马尼拉对属于其专属经济区内的南海水域的术语。

The Chinese aircraft continued on its flight route without further incident, Trinidad said.翻译:特立尼达表示，中国飞机继续沿航线飞行，没有发生进一步事件。

Philippine military chief Romeo Brawner said the nation was well its rights to conduct joint patrols with allies to promote the "rule-based international order."翻译:菲律宾军事首长罗密欧·布劳纳表示，该国完全有权与盟国进行联合巡逻，以促进“基于规则的国际秩序”。

Participating in the joint drills were two Philippine navy vessels and five Philippine surveillance aircraft, and Australia's frigate Toowoomba and P8-A maritime surveillance aircraft.翻译:参加联合演习的有菲律宾海军两艘舰艇和五架菲律宾侦察机，以及澳大利亚图文巴号护卫舰和P8-A海上侦察机。

Reporting by Karen Lema; Editing by William Mallard翻译:凯伦·莱玛报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 中国卫生部寻求更多发热门诊以应对呼吸道疾病激增
item.description:
China's health ministry on Sunday urged local authorities to increase the number of fever clinics as the country grapples with a surge in respiratory illnesses in its first full winter since easing COVID-19 restrictions.翻译:中国卫生部周日敦促地方当局增加发热门诊的数量，因为中国正应对呼吸道疾病激增的问题，这是自放宽 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季。

The spike become a global issue last week when the World Health Organization asked China for more information, citing a report on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children by the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases.翻译:上周，世界卫生组织引用新发疾病监测计划关于儿童未确诊肺炎群的报告，要求中国提供更多信息，从而使病例激增成为一个全球性问题。

China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting early in the pandemic, which emerged in the central Chinese city of Wuhan in late 2019. The WHO said on Friday no new or unusual pathogens had been found in the recent illnesses.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织在 2019 年底在中国中部城市武汉爆发的疫情早期报告透明度方面面临质疑。世界卫生组织周五表示，在最近的疾病中没有发现新的或不寻常的病原体。

National Health Commission spokesperson Mi Feng said on Sunday the surge in acute respiratory illnesses was linked to the simultaneous circulation of several kinds of pathogens, most prominently influenza.翻译:国家卫生健康委员会新闻发言人米锋周日表示，急性呼吸道疾病的激增与多种病原体同时传播有关，其中最突出的是流感。

"Efforts should be made to increase the number of relevant clinics and treatment areas, appropriately extend service hours and strengthen guarantees of drug supplies," Mi told a news conference.翻译:米在新闻发布会上说：“要努力增加相关诊所和治疗区的数量，适当延长服务时间，加强药品供应保障。”

"It is necessary to do a good job in epidemic prevention and control in key crowded places such as schools, childcare institutions and nursing homes, and to reduce the flow of people and visits."翻译:“要做好学校、托幼机构、养老院等重点人员密集场所的疫情防控，减少人员流动和探访。”

Cases among children are appearing especially high in northern areas like Beijing and Liaoning province, where hospitals are warning of long waits.翻译:在北京和辽宁省等北方地区，儿童病例尤其多，医院警告称，等待时间较长。

The State Council, China's cabinet, said on Friday that influenza would peak this winter and spring, while mycoplasma pneumoniae infection would remain high in some areas. It also warned of the risk of a rebound in COVID infections.翻译:中国国务院周五表示，今年冬春季流感高峰期将持续，部分地区肺炎支原体感染率仍将居高不下。它还警告了新冠病毒感染反弹的风险。

"All localities should strengthen information reporting on infectious diseases to ensure information is reported in a timely and accurate manner," the State Council said in a statement.翻译:国务院在一份声明中表示：“各地要加强传染病信息报告，确保信息报告及时、准确。”

On Thursday the WHO said data provided by China suggested the recent cases were linked to the lifting of COVID curbs 11 months ago, along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects children, which has circulated since May.翻译:周四，世界卫生组织表示，中国提供的数据表明，最近的病例与 11 个月前解除新冠疫情限制措施有关，同时还与肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关。肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响儿童，自 5 月份以来一直在传播。 。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; Editing by William Mallard翻译:陈劳瑞报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 中国警告韩国不要将经济问题政治化
item.description:
Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi warned his South Korean counterpart on Sunday not to politicise economic and tech issues as the two prepared to meet Japan's top diplomat on the sidelines of a trilateral meeting aimed at boosting cooperation.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周日警告韩国外长不要将经济和技术问题政治化，因为两国准备在旨在促进合作的三边会议期间会见日本最高外交官。

"China and South Korea have become cooperation partners with highly integrated interests and highly interconnected production and supply chains," Wang told South Korean Foreign Minister Park Jin, according to a Chinese foreign ministry readout.翻译:据中国外交部报道，王毅对韩国外交部长朴进说：“中韩已成为利益高度融合、生产供应链高度互联的合作伙伴。”

"Both sides should jointly resist the tendency to politicise economic issues, instrumentalise science and tech issues, and the broad securitisation of trade issues."翻译:双方应共同抵制经济问题政治化、科技问题工具化、贸易问题广泛证券化的倾向。

South Korea has sought to avoid becoming embroiled in a tit-for-tat row between China and the United States over semiconductors.翻译:韩国一直试图避免卷入中美在半导体领域的针锋相对的争端。

The U.S. last month granted Samsung Electronics (005930.KS) and SK Hynix (000660.KS) permission to supply U.S. chip equipment to their China factories indefinitely, ending a conundrum for the world's two largest memory chipmakers.翻译:美国上个月批准三星电子（005930.KS）和SK海力士（000660.KS） 无限期向其中国工厂供应美国芯片设备，结束了全球最大的两家存储芯片制造商的难题。

"China is willing to jointly promote the restart of revamped trilateral cooperation with South Korea and Japan," Wang said on Sunday.翻译:“中方愿与韩日共同推动重启三方合作，”王周日表示。

While China and the United States have been mending frayed ties, including a summit this month between Presidents Xi Jinping and Joe Biden, Beijing is concerned that Washington and its key regional allies are strengthening their three-way partnership.翻译:尽管中美两国一直在修复紧张的关系，包括本月习近平主席和拜登总统举行峰会，但北京方面对华盛顿及其主要地区盟友正在加强三方伙伴关系感到担忧。

Beijing, Tokyo and Seoul had agreed to hold summits every year starting in 2008 to bolster diplomatic and economic exchanges, but the plan has been blocked by bilateral rows and the COVID-19 pandemic. Their last trilateral leaders' meeting was in 2019.翻译:北京、东京和首尔同意从 2008 年开始每年举行峰会，以加强外交和经济交流，但该计划因双边争端和新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行而受阻。上一次三边领导人会议是在 2019 年。

The three foreign ministers are gathering in the port city of Busan, also the first such meeting since 2019. In September, senior officials from the three countries agreed to arrange a trilateral summit at the "earliest convenient time".翻译:三位外长齐聚港口城市釜山，这也是自 2019 年以来的首次此类会议。9 月，三个国家的高级官员同意在“尽早方便的时间”安排举行三边峰会。

South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida have taken steps to repair ties strained by history and trade feuds, and held a historic trilateral summit in August with Biden.翻译:韩国总统尹锡烈和日本首相岸田文雄已采取措施修复因历史和贸易争端而紧张的关系，并于 8 月与拜登举行了历史性的三边峰会。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; Editing by William Mallard翻译:陈劳瑞报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 台湾近海地震 暂无受损报告
item.description:
A magnitude 5.4 earthquake struck off Taiwan's east coast on Sunday, the island's weather bureau said, briefly shaking buildings in the capital Taipei but with no reports of damage.翻译:台湾气象局称，台湾东海岸周日发生里氏 5.4 级地震，首都台北的建筑物发生短暂震动，但尚未收到损坏报告。

The epicentre of the earthquake was in the sea off Taiwan's Hualien county, at a depth of 22.4 km (14 miles), the weather bureau said.翻译:气象局称，地震震中位于台湾花莲县附近海域，深度为22.4公里（14英里）。

Taiwan lies near the junction of two tectonic plates and is prone to earthquakes.翻译:台湾位于两个板块交界处，地震频发。

More than 100 people were killed in a quake in southern Taiwan in 2016, while a 7.3 magnitude quake killed more than 2,000 people in 1999.翻译:2016年台湾南部的地震造成100多人死亡，而1999年的7.3级地震则造成2000多人死亡。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by William Mallard翻译:本·布兰查德报道；威廉·马拉德编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 鲁丹希望流浪者队找到解决客场困境的办法
item.description:
Western Sydney Wanderers coach Marko Rudan is hoping his side have overcome last season's poor away after retaining their place at the top of the A-League standings on Saturday, with a 1-0 victory over derby rivals Sydney FC.翻译:西悉尼流浪者队主教练马尔科·鲁丹希望他的球队能够克服上赛季糟糕的客场表现，在周六以 1-0 战胜德比对手悉尼FC，保住澳超联赛榜首的位置。

Zac Sapsford's goal 18 minutes from time secured the three points at Sydney Football Stadium against Ufuk Talay's team as Wanderers remained in pole position five games into the new campaign.翻译:距离比赛结束还有 18 分钟时，扎克·萨普斯福德 (Zac Sapsford) 的进球确保了悉尼足球场对阵乌福克·塔莱 (Ufuk Talay) 球队的三分，流浪者队在新赛季五场比赛中仍保持领先位置。

"Our away form last year wasn't the best and it's something we looked into deeply, whether it be the way we trained, whether it be the way we travelled and what we did with the travelling, or was it mentality," said Rudan.翻译:“去年我们的客场表现并不是最好的，这是我们深入研究的问题，无论是我们的训练方式，无论是我们的旅行方式以及我们在旅行中所做的事情，还是心态，”鲁丹说。

"Certainly from a mentality point of view there was one thing I wanted to change at this football club; you've got to earn the right, and being hard to beat was the first step last year.翻译:“当然，从心态的角度来看，我想在这个足球俱乐部改变一件事；你必须赢得权利，而难以击败是去年的第一步。

"And then, playing the way I want my teams to play, which we showed in the second half of the year, and now this year again, which was always important.翻译:“然后，按照我希望我的球队踢球的方式进行比赛，我们在今年下半年和今年再次展示了这一点，这始终很重要。

"But in terms of where, that doesn't bother me."翻译:“但就地点而言，这并不困扰我。”

Wanderers won only twice away from their home stadium in Parramatta last season and Saturday's victory was their first on their travels in the league since March.翻译:流浪者队上赛季在帕拉马塔的主场只赢得了两次胜利，而周六的胜利是他们自三月份以来在联赛中的第一次胜利。

That win also came at the same venue where they handed a 4-0 thrashing to Sydney FC and Rudan was delighted to dish out another loss to his club's bitter rivals.翻译:这场胜利也是在同一场地以 4-0 惨败悉尼FC 的比赛中取得的，鲁丹很高兴再次输给了俱乐部的死敌。

"The great thing is ... we won, and in their backyard," he said. "Really great for our fans, that's what I'm most proud about, because I bang on about it all the time.翻译:“最棒的是……我们赢了，而且是在他们的后院，”他说。 “这对我们的粉丝来说真的很棒，这是我最自豪的，因为我一直在谈论它。

"Our fans are great, our area's great. There's a bigger purpose, as far as I'm concerned, for this football club, and the players that represent it."翻译:“我们的球迷很棒，我们的地区也很棒。就我而言，对于这个足球俱乐部以及代表它的球员来说，有一个更大的目标。”

Reporting by Michael Church; Editing by Clarence Fernandez翻译:迈克尔·丘奇报道；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 中国承诺深化与越南的贸易关系
item.description:
Chinese Commerce Minister Wang Wentao pledged to deepen bilateral trade ties with Vietnam during a meeting with Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh in Ho Chi Minh City on Saturday, China's commerce ministry said.翻译:中国商务部表示，中国商务部部长王文涛周六在胡志明市会见越南总理范明正时承诺深化与越南的双边贸易关系。

Wang said China-Vietnam trade cooperation had already achieved "fruitful results" and would include strategic areas such as the digital economy, green development and cross-border e-commerce, according to a readout published late Saturday by the Chinese ministry.翻译:据中国商务部周六晚间发布的消息称，王毅表示，中越贸易合作已取得“丰硕成果”，并将涵盖数字经济、绿色发展和跨境电子商务等战略领域。

China and the United States have been jostling for influence among Southeast Asian nations including Vietnam, which in September elevated its ties with Washington to a comprehensive strategic partnership, putting its one-time enemy on par with Beijing and Moscow.翻译:中国和美国一直在争夺在包括越南在内的东南亚国家中的影响力，越南于9月将与华盛顿的关系提升为全面战略伙伴关系，将其曾经的敌人与北京和莫斯科平起平坐。

Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Sun Weidong held "frank and friendly talks" on bilateral ties, land borders and maritime issues with Vietnam's Deputy Foreign Minister Nguyen Minh Vu in Hanoi earlier this month.翻译:中国外交部副部长孙卫东本月早些时候在河内与越南外交部副部长阮明武就双边关系、陆地边界和海上问题进行了“坦诚友好的会谈”。

Sources familiar with the situation told Reuters last month that Vietnamese and Chinese officials were preparing for a possible trip by Chinese President Xi Jinping to Hanoi in late October or early November, although three Hanoi-based diplomats later said the visit was likely to be postponed until December.翻译:熟悉情况的消息人士上个月告诉路透社，越南和中国官员正在为中国国家主席习近平可能于 10 月底或 11 月初访问河内做准备，尽管三名驻河内外交官后来表示，访问可能会推迟到十二月。

Wang also met Ho Chi Minh City's Vietnamese Communist Party secretary Nguyen Van Nen on Saturday, the Chinese commerce ministry said.翻译:中国商务部称，王毅周六还会见了胡志明市市委书记阮文年。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; Editing by Edmund Klamann翻译:陈劳瑞报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼

item.title: 北京警方对陷入困境的财富管理公司中植立案调查
item.description:
Beijing police are investigating suspected crimes committed by Zhongzhi Enterprise Group, a leading Chinese wealth manager, according to a social media post published by the Chaoyang Public Security Bureau on Saturday.翻译:据朝阳市公安局周六发布的社交媒体帖子称，北京警方正在调查中国领先的财富管理公司中植企业集团涉嫌犯罪行为。

Zhongzhi earlier this week told investors it is heavily insolvent with up to $64 billion in liabilities, threatening to reignite concerns that China's property debt crisis is spilling over into the broader financial sector.翻译:中植本周早些时候告诉投资者，该公司已严重资不抵债，负债高达640 亿美元，这可能会再次引发人们对中国房地产债务危机蔓延至更广泛的金融领域的担忧。

The firm has sizable exposure to China's real estate sector and is a major player in China's $3 trillion shadow banking sector - roughly the size of the French economy.翻译:该公司在中国房地产行业拥有相当大的风险敞口，并且是中国规模达 3 万亿美元的影子银行业的主要参与者，该规模与法国经济规模大致相当。

Zhongzhi did not immediately reply to an email request for comment after normal business hours on Saturday. A phone call went unanswered.翻译:周六正常工作时间后，中植没有立即回复置评请求的电子邮件。一个电话无人接听。

Zhongzhi apologised to its investors in a letter issued on Wednesday that said it had total liabilities of about 420 billion yuan ($58 billion) to 460 billion yuan ($64 billion), compared to estimated total assets of 200 billion yuan.翻译:中植在周三发布的一封信中向投资者道歉，称其总负债约为人民币4200亿元（合580亿美元）至人民币4600亿元（合640亿美元），而总资产估计为人民币2000亿元。

The social media post from Beijing authorities said it was looking into "many" suspects involved with the company and encouraged investors to report their losses in order to help with the ongoing investigation.翻译:北京当局在社交媒体上发帖称，正在调查与该公司有关的“许多”嫌疑人，并鼓励投资者报告损失，以协助正在进行的调查。

"Investors are requested to actively cooperate with the police in investigating and collecting evidence and safeguard their rights and interests through legal channels," it read in part.翻译:“请投资者积极配合警方调查取证，通过法律途径维护自身权益，”其中部分内容写道。

The post did not specify what crimes Zhongzhi or the individuals were suspected of having committed.翻译:该帖子没有具体说明中植或这些人涉嫌犯下哪些罪行。

Reporting by Casey Hall Editing by Mark Potter翻译:凯西·霍尔报道 马克·波特编辑

item.title: 日本和中国外长同意举行安全会谈、改善关系的计划
item.description:
Japan and China are hoping to hold security talks "in the near future", Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa said on Saturday after meeting with China's top diplomat Wang Yi in South Korea.翻译:日本外务大臣上川洋子周六在韩国会见中国最高外交官王毅后表示，日本和中国希望“在不久的将来”举行安全会谈。

The talks between Kamikawa and Wang marked the first time the two senior diplomats had met since Kamikawa became Japan's foreign minister in September and followed the first face-to-face talks in a year by their countries' leaders earlier this month.翻译:上川和王之间的会谈是自九月上川就任日本外相以来两位高级外交官的首次会面，此前两国领导人本月早些时候进行了一年来的首次面对面会谈。

"We confirmed that we are seeking further close communication on a variety of issues... and we are hoping to hold security talks in the near future," Kamikawa told reporters.翻译:“我们确认，我们正在寻求就各种问题进行进一步密切沟通……我们希望在不久的将来举行安全会谈，”上川告诉记者。

An account of the meeting released by China's Foreign Ministry said Wang had emphasised the need for both sides to make clear they "do not pose a threat to one another", while respecting "each other's legitimate concerns".翻译:中国外交部发布的会议记录称，王毅强调双方需要明确表示“不对彼此构成威胁”，同时尊重“彼此的合理关切”。

Kamikawa said Japan was seeking a lifting of a Chinese ban on all Japanese seafood-related exports in the wake of the wastewater release from the crippled Fukushima nuclear power plant.翻译:上川表示，在受损的福岛核电站排放废水后，日本正在寻求解除中国对所有日本海鲜相关出口的禁令。

The Chinese ministry said it opposes "Japan's irresponsible practices" and that there was a need to establish a "long-term monitoring mechanism for all stakeholders."翻译:中国外交部表示反对“日方不负责任的做法”，并表示有必要建立“面向所有利益相关者的长期监督机制”。

Japan and China will also seek high level talks on the economy, Kamikawa said, adding that no date had been set.翻译:上川表示，日本和中国还将就经济问题寻求高层会谈，但日期尚未确定。

China's President Xi Jinping and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida met on the sidelines of an international conference in the United States on Nov. 17, where they agreed to pursue mutually beneficial relations.翻译:11月17日，中国国家主席习近平和日本首相岸田文雄在美国出席国际会议期间会见，一致同意发展互利共赢关系。

They appeared to emphasise shared economic interests amid a series of diplomatic disputes that have plagued relations between the two countries, including the release of wastewater from Fukushima into the Pacific and the detainment of a Japanese national in China.翻译:他们似乎在一系列困扰两国关系的外交争端中强调共同的经济利益，这些争端包括福岛废水排入太平洋以及一名日本公民在中国被拘留。

Kamikawa said she communicated Japan's stance on these issues, but also emphasised that Japan and China will be in close communication on the matters that divide them.翻译:上川表示，她传达了日方在这些问题上的立场，但也强调日中双方将就存在分歧的问题保持密切沟通。

"We also discussed issues that the countries must work together on... and we were able to have a meaningful exchange of views on climate change, international insurance, development finance, as well as the North Korea situation," she said, without elaborating.翻译:她说：“我们还讨论了各国必须共同努力解决的问题……我们能够就气候变化、国际保险、发展金融以及朝鲜局势等问题交换了有意义的意见。”但她没有详细说明。 。

Kamikawa and Wang will attend trilateral talks with their South Korean counterpart Park Jin on Sunday.翻译:上川和王将于周日与韩国外长朴镇参加三边会谈。

Reporting by Sakura Murakami in Tokyo and Casey Hall in Shanghai; Editing by Mark Potter and Mike Harrison翻译:村上樱在东京和凯西·霍尔在上海的报道；马克·波特和迈克·哈里森编辑

item.title: 中国军队在车队起火后在缅甸边境附近举行训练演习
item.description:
China's military will begin "combat training activities" from Saturday on its side of the border with Myanmar, it said on social media, a day after a convoy of trucks carrying goods into the neighbouring Southeast Asian nation went up in flames.翻译:中国军方在社交媒体上表示，中国军队将从周六开始在与缅甸接壤的边境一侧开始“战斗训练活动”，一天前，一支向邻国东南亚国家运送货物的卡车车队起火。

The incident, which Myanmar state media called an insurgent attack, came amid insecurity concerns in China, whose envoy met top officials in Myanmar's capital for talks on border stability after recent signs of rare strain in their ties.翻译:缅甸官方媒体称这起事件为叛乱袭击，发生在中国的不安全担忧之际。中国的特使在缅甸首都会见了高级官员，就边境稳定问题进行了会谈，此前有迹象表明两国关系最近出现了罕见的紧张。

The training aims to "test the rapid maneuverability, border sealing and fire strike capabilities of theatre troops," the Southern Theatre Command, one of five in China's People's Liberation Army, said on the WeChat messaging app.翻译:中国人民解放军五个军区之一的南部战区在微信应用程序上表示，此次训练旨在“检验战区部队的快速机动、封边和火力打击能力”。

A separate statement released by the provincial government of China's Yunnan, which neighbours Myanmar, said the drills would run until Nov. 28 in the areas near Manghai, Manling and Qingshuihe villages.翻译:与缅甸接壤的中国云南省政府发布的另一份声明称，演习将在芒海、曼岭和清水河村附近地区持续到11月28日。

Myanmar was told of the drills, military junta spokesman Zaw Min Tun said, adding that they aimed to "maintain stability and peace" near the border, and did not undermine China's policy of non-interference in Myanmar's internal affairs.翻译:军政府发言人佐敏吞表示，缅甸已获悉此次演习的情况，并补充说，演习的目的是“维护边境附近的稳定与和平”，并没有破坏中国不干涉缅甸内政的政策。

"The military tie between China and Myanmar is firm and collaboration between both armies is friendly and building up," he said in his post on state-run social media.翻译:他在官方社交媒体上发帖称：“中缅两国军事关系牢固，两军合作友好且不断加强。”

Friday's fire in the town of Muse came as Myanmar's military has lost control of several towns and military outposts in the northeast and elsewhere as it battles the biggest co-ordinated offensive it has faced since seizing power in a 2021 coup.翻译:周五木姐镇发生火灾之际，缅甸军方正面临自 2021 年政变夺权以来最大规模的协同攻势，失去了对东北部和其他地区几个城镇和军事前哨的控制。

The surge in fighting has displaced more than 2 million people in Myanmar, the United Nations says.翻译:联合国称， 战斗激增已导致缅甸超过 200 万人流离失所。

Reporting by Casey Hall and Poppy McPherson; Editing by Clarence Fernandez翻译:凯西·霍尔和波比·麦克弗森的报道；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 菲律宾、澳大利亚开始在南海进行海空巡逻
item.description:
The Philippines and Australia began their first joint sea and air patrols in the South China Sea on Saturday, days after Manila took similar steps with the U.S. as Pacific nations warily eye an increasingly assertive China.翻译:周六，菲律宾和澳大利亚开始在南海进行首次联合海上和空中巡逻，几天前，马尼拉与美国采取了类似的措施，因为太平洋国家警惕地注视着日益自信的中国。

The three-day exercises, announced by Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr on social media, follow discussions by the Philippines and Australia early this year on joint patrols to underscore what they say is their commitment to a rules-based order.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯在社交媒体上宣布了为期三天的演习，此前菲律宾和澳大利亚今年早些时候就联合巡逻进行了讨论，以强调他们所说的对基于规则的秩序的承诺。

China claims almost the entire South China Sea, a conduit for more than $3 trillion of annual ship-borne commerce, including parts claimed by the Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，南海是每年超过 3 万亿美元的船运贸易的通道，其中包括菲律宾、越南、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和文莱声称拥有主权的部分地区。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

The Philippines is ramping up efforts to counter what it describes as China's "aggressive activities" in the South China Sea, which has also become a flashpoint for Chinese and U.S. tensions around naval operations.翻译:菲律宾正在加大力度反击其所称的中国在南海的“侵略活动”，南海也成为中美围绕海军行动紧张关系的导火索。

"Australia and the Philippines are firmly committed to peaceful, secure and prosperous region, where sovereignty and agreed rules and norms are respected," Australian Deputy Prime Minister Richard Marles said in a joint statement posted by Marcos.翻译:澳大利亚副总理理查德·马尔斯在马科斯发表的联合声明中表示：“澳大利亚和菲律宾坚定致力于建设和平、安全和繁荣的地区，该地区的主权和商定的规则和规范都受到尊重。”

"The first joint patrol between the Australian Defence Force and the Armed Forces of the Philippines demonstrates this commitment," Marles said.翻译:马勒斯说：“澳大利亚国防军和菲律宾武装部队之间的首次联合巡逻体现了这一承诺。”

The patrols will be carried out in the West Philippine Sea, said Philippine Department of National Defense spokesperson Arsenio Andolong, using Manila's term for waters in the South China Sea that fall within its exclusive economic zone.翻译:菲律宾国防部发言人阿森尼奥·安多隆（Arsenio Andolong）表示，巡逻活动将在西菲律宾海进行。马尼拉用马尼拉语来形容属于其专属经济区内的南海水域。

The Philippine military said two of its navy vessels and five surveillance aircraft would participate, while Australia would send the frigate Toowoomba and P8-A maritime surveillance aircraft.翻译:菲律宾军方表示，其两艘海军舰艇和五架侦察机将参加，澳大利亚将派出图文巴号护卫舰和 P8-A 海上侦察机。

"This inaugural Maritime Cooperative Activity and those that may follow are a practical manifestation of the growing and deepening strategic and defense partnership between our countries," Marcos said on X, the platform formerly called Twitter.翻译:马科斯在 X（该平台以前称为 Twitter）上表示：“首次海上合作活动以及后续可能开展的活动是我们两国之间不断发展和深化的战略与防务伙伴关系的实际体现。”

The Philippines and the United States concluded three-day joint sea and air patrols on Thursday, starting in waters near Taiwan, a democratically governed island that China claims as its own, and ending in the West Philippine Sea.翻译:菲律宾和美国周四结束了为期三天的联合海上和空中巡逻，从台湾附近海域开始，结束于西菲律宾海。台湾是一个民主管理的岛屿，中国声称拥有自己的岛屿。

China has accused the Philippines of enlisting "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea and stirring up trouble.翻译:中国指责菲律宾招募“外国势力”在南海巡逻并煽动事端。 Manila insists the maritime activities are within its rights.翻译:中国指责菲律宾招募“外国势力”在南海巡逻并煽动事端。马尼拉坚称海上活动属于其权利范围。

item.title: 中国法院驳回加拿大流行歌星吴亦凡的上诉
item.description:
A court in China's capital Beijing on Friday denied the appeal of Chinese-born Canadian pop star Kris Wu, who was sentenced to 13 years in prison for crimes including rape.翻译:中国首都北京一家法院周五驳回了出生于中国的加拿大流行歌星吴亦凡的上诉，吴亦凡因强奸等罪名被判处 13 年有期徒刑。

The former member of K-pop group EXO returned to China in 2014, where he built a lucrative career. In 2017 Wu made his Hollywood debut in the film "XXX: Return of Xander Cage".翻译:这位韩国流行乐队 EXO 的前成员于 2014 年回到中国，并在那里建立了一份利润丰厚的职业生涯。 2017年，吴宇森凭借电影《XXX：桑德·凯奇归来》首次亮相好莱坞。

"Wu violated the will of women and took advantage of the drunkenness of multiple victims to have sexual relations with them. His behaviour constituted the crime of rape," the court said in a statement.翻译:法院在一份声明中表示：“吴某违反妇女意愿，利用多名受害人醉酒时与其发生性关系，其行为已构成强奸罪。”

Wu, 33, was detained in July 2021 after an 18-year-old Chinese student publicly accused him of inducing her and other girls, some younger than 18, to have sex with him.翻译:33 岁的吴于 2021 年 7 月被拘留，此前一名 18 岁的中国学生公开指控他引诱她和其他女孩（其中一些年龄不到 18 岁）与他发生性关系。

Affirming the trial court's ruling, Beijing No. 3 Intermediate People's Court ruled that Wu gathered a crowd to engage in lewd activities and was the ringleader, therefore his behaviour constituted the crime of group licentiousness.翻译:北京市第三中级人民法院维持了原审法院的判决，认定吴某聚众进行猥亵活动，且为首要分子，其行为已构成集体淫乱罪。

His close relatives and officials from the Canadian embassy in China attended the verdict announcement.翻译:他的近亲属和加拿大驻华使馆官员旁听了宣判。

Wu, who could not be contacted, has previously denied the accusation. Reuters did not have access to his relatives or his legal representatives for comment.翻译:无法联系到吴先生，他此前否认了这一指控。路透社未能联系到他的亲属或法律代表发表评论。

"The Government of Canada is aware that a final decision was rendered in the case," said Jeremie Berube, spokesperson at Global Affairs Canada, which manages the government's diplomatic and consular relations.翻译:负责管理政府外交和领事关系的加拿大全球事务部发言人杰里米·贝鲁贝（Jeremie Berube）表示：“加拿大政府知道此案已做出最终决定。”

Consular officials have been actively engaged on Wu's case and are providing consular assistance to him and his family, Berube said in a statement to Reuters.翻译:贝鲁贝在给路透社的一份声明中表示，领事官员一直在积极处理吴的案件，并向他和他的家人提供领事协助。

The Canadian government said in July that its diplomats had been denied access to the start of Wu's appeal trial. Beijing said it notified the embassy of the appeal trial in advance but it was not open to the public to protect the privacy of the victims.翻译:加拿大政府七月表示，其外交官被拒绝旁听吴上诉审判的开始。北京表示，已提前将上诉审判通知使馆，但为保护受害者隐私，不向公众公开。

At the time of his detention, Wu was an ambassador for 15 brands, including Bulgari, Lancome, Louis Vuitton and Porsche, all of which immediately severed ties with him.翻译:吴宇森被捕时是宝格丽、兰蔻、路易威登、保时捷等15个品牌的形象大使，这些品牌立即与他断绝了关系。

item.title: 中国应对呼吸道疾病激增，世卫组织称未发现异常病原体
item.description:
China called for vigilance on Friday as a surge of respiratory illness hit schools and hospitals and the World Health Organization, which has asked the government for disease data, said no unusual or novel pathogens had been detected.翻译:周五，随着呼吸道疾病激增袭击学校和医院，中国呼吁保持警惕，世界卫生组织已要求政府提供疾病数据，表示尚未发现异常或新型病原体。

China is grappling with a spike in respiratory illnesses as it enters its first full winter season since it lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December, with cases among children appearing especially high in northern areas like Beijing and Liaoning province where hospitals are warning of long waits.翻译:中国正在应对呼吸道疾病激增的问题，这是自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季，其中北京和辽宁省等北方地区的儿童病例尤其多，这些地区的医院警告称，等待时间较长。

The State Council said influenza would peak this winter and spring and mycoplasma pneumoniae infection would continue to be high in some areas in future. It also warned of the risk of a rebound in COVID infections.翻译:国务院表示，今冬春季流感高峰期，未来部分地区肺炎支原体感染仍将持续高发。它还警告了新冠病毒感染反弹的风险。

"All localities should strengthen information reporting on infectious diseases to ensure information is reported in a timely and accurate manner," the State Council said in a statement.翻译:国务院在一份声明中表示：“各地要加强传染病信息报告，确保信息报告及时、准确。”

The situation came into the spotlight this week when the WHO asked China for more information, citing a report by the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children.翻译:本周，世界卫生组织援引新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）关于儿童未确诊肺炎集群的报告，要求中国提供更多信息，这一情况成为人们关注的焦点。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

On Thursday, the WHO said China had responded to its request and the data it provided suggested the cases were linked to the lifting of COVID curbs along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects children, which has circulated since May.翻译:周四，世界卫生组织表示，中国已回应其要求，其提供的数据表明，这些病例与取消新冠疫情限制以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响儿童， 5月以来流传。

This month, authorities began issuing health advisories saying they were paying attention to the situation and warning the public of long waits and the risk of cross-infection at crowded hospitals but they have not imposed measures like the ones during the COVID pandemic, such as masks or closing schools.翻译:本月，当局开始发布健康建议，称他们正在关注局势，并警告公众不要在拥挤的医院长时间等待和交叉感染的风险，但他们没有采取像新冠病毒大流行期间那样的措施，例如戴口罩或关闭学校。

There has been no indication of any undue public alarm.翻译:没有迹象表明任何公众过度恐慌。

Bruce Thompson, head of the Melbourne School of Health Sciences at the University of Melbourne, said very preliminary data suggested there was nothing out of the ordinary.翻译:墨尔本大学墨尔本健康科学学院院长布鲁斯·汤普森表示，非常初步的数据表明没有什么异常。

"At this stage, there is nothing to suggest that it may be a new variant of COVID," he said.翻译:他说：“现阶段，没有任何迹象表明它可能是新冠病毒的新变种。”

"One thing to note is that we can be reassured that the surveillance processes are working, which is a very good thing."翻译:“值得注意的是，我们可以放心，监控流程正在发挥作用，这是一件非常好的事情。”

Parents in Shanghai on Friday said they were not overly concerned about the wave of sickness, saying while it appeared to be more severe, they expected it to blow over soon.翻译:周五，上海的家长们表示，他们并不太担心这波疫情，虽然疫情似乎更加严重，但他们预计疫情很快就会过去。

"Colds happen all over the world," said Emily Wu outside a children's hospital. "I hope that people will not be biased because of the pandemic ... but look at this from a scientific perspective."翻译:“世界各地都会发生感冒，”艾米丽·吴在儿童医院外说道。 “我希望人们不会因为疫情而产生偏见……但要从科学的角度看待这个问题。”

Another mother, Feng Zixun, said she was making her eight-year-old son wear a mask and wash his hands more often but nothing much more.翻译:另一位母亲冯子勋说，她只是让八岁的儿子戴口罩、勤洗手，仅此而已。

"It's not that bad, there are more children falling sick now but it's mainly an issue of protection," she said.翻译:“情况并没有那么糟糕，现在有更多的孩子生病，但这主要是一个保护问题，”她说。

Reporting by Andrew Silver and Nicoco Chan in Shanghai and the Beijing Newsroom; writing by Brenda Goh; Editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Andrew Silver 和 Nicoco Chan 在上海和北京新闻编辑室的报道；布伦达·吴 (Brenda Goh) 撰写；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 缅甸特使会谈时，车队在中国边境被烧毁
item.description:
A convoy of trucks bringing goods into Myanmar from China has gone up in flames in what state media reported on Friday was an insurgent attack, compounding surging insecurity that has raised concern in neighbouring China.翻译:官方媒体周五报道称，一支从中国运往缅甸的卡车车队起火，这是一起叛乱分子袭击事件，加剧了日益加剧的不安全局势，引发了邻国中国的担忧。

The fire in the town of Muse came as China's ambassador to Myanmar met top officials in the Myanmar capital for talks on stability on the border after recent signs that their relationship has been coming under rare strain.翻译:木姐镇火灾发生之际，中国驻缅甸大使在缅甸首都会见高级官员，就边境稳定问题进行会谈。最近有迹象表明，中缅关系正面临罕见的紧张。

"Due to this terrorist act ... about 120 out of 258 vehicles carrying household goods, consumer goods, clothes and building materials were destroyed by fire," the state-run Global New Light of Myanmar newspaper reported, referring to an opposition alliance that launched an offensive against the junta a month ago.翻译:缅甸国营《全球新光报》报道称，“由于这一恐怖行为……258 辆运载家庭用品、消费品、衣服和建筑材料的车辆中约有 120 辆被大火烧毁”，该报指的是一个反对派联盟，该联盟一个月前对军政府发起进攻。

Li Kyar Win, a spokesman for one of the insurgent forces, denied torching the convoy saying it did not conduct attacks that would "destroy the people's interests".翻译:其中一支叛乱部队的发言人李凯温(Li Kyar Win)否认纵火焚烧车队，称其没有进行“破坏人民利益”的袭击。

Myanmar's military has lost control of several towns and military outposts in the northeast and elsewhere around the country as it grapples with the biggest coordinated offensive it has faced since it seized power in a 2021 coup.翻译:缅甸军方正在努力应对自 2021 年政变夺权以来所面临的最大规模的协同攻势，该国军方已经失去了对东北部和全国其他地区的几个城镇和军事哨所的控制。

More than 2 million people have been displaced in different parts of the country due to the surge of fighting, the United Nations says.翻译:联合国表示，由于战斗激增，该国各地已有超过 200 万人流离失所。

Earlier in the week, at least 10 people were killed in Laukkai town, which like Muse is also in Shan State on the border with China, media reported, when a rocket hit a vehicle of people trying to flee the fighting.翻译:据媒体报道，本周早些时候，一枚火箭弹击中了一辆试图逃离战斗的人的车辆，造成至少 10 人死亡。

Spokespeople for the junta and a rebel group operating in the area both condemned the incident and denied responsibility.翻译:军政府和在该地区活动的叛乱组织发言人均谴责了这一事件，并否认对此负责。

Reuters could not independently verify the death toll in the attack.翻译:路透社无法独立核实袭击中的死亡人数。

China has called for peace and stability in Myanmar and the latest unrest came as its ambassador, Chen Hai, was meeting Myanmar's military-appointed foreign minister, Than Swe, and military officials in the capital, Naypyitaw.翻译:中国呼吁缅甸实现和平与稳定，最新的骚乱发生之际，中国大使陈海正在首都内比都会见缅甸军方任命的外交部长丹瑞和军方官员。

They discussed "bilateral relations, continued implementation of mutually beneficial bilateral projects" and "cooperation in peace and stability and rule of law along the borde", Myanmar state media reported.翻译:据缅甸官方媒体报道，他们讨论了“双边关系、继续实施互利的双边项目”以及“边境地区和平稳定及法治合作”。

China's embassy in Myanmar issued a notice late on Friday asking Chinese nationals stranded in Laukkai to evacuate as soon as possible, citing "high" safety risks.

CRACKDOWN ON CRIME

Before the latest insurgent offensive, Chinese and Myanmar junta officials had launched a crackdown in the region on gangs operating internet fraud centres that China blames for cheating many of its people.翻译:在最近的叛乱攻势之前，中国和缅甸军政府官员已在该地区对经营互联网诈骗中心的团伙发起打击，中国指责这些团伙欺骗了许多人民。

As part of that drive, Myanmar handed over tens of thousands Chinese telecom fraud suspects this month.翻译:作为这一行动的一部分，缅甸本月移交了数万名中国电信诈骗嫌疑人。

The fighting close to the border and the drive against the online fraud gangs, many organised by Chinese criminals, has shone a spotlight on the neighbours' relations.翻译:边境附近的战斗以及对网络诈骗团伙（其中许多是由中国犯罪分子组织）的打击，使邻国关系成为人们关注的焦点。

China has been supportive of the Myanmar military since it seized power in 2021 but Chinese authorities have for years had complex cross-border relations with factions in northeast Myanmar often outside the control of the central government.翻译:自缅甸2021年夺权以来，中国一直支持缅甸军方，但多年来中国当局与缅甸东北部各派之间的跨境关系复杂，往往不受中央政府的控制。

Myanmar authorities have long suspected China of meddling in support of some militia factions.翻译:缅甸当局长期以来一直怀疑中国干预支持一些民兵派别。

On the weekend, in a rare rally in Myanmar since a sweeping crackdown on dissent, dozens of nationalist protesters gathered outside the Chinese embassy in the main city of Yangon with banners and posters critical of Beijing.翻译:周末，数十名民族主义抗议者聚集在主要城市仰光的中国大使馆外，举着批评北京的横幅和海报，这是缅甸自全面镇压异见以来罕见的集会。

"We request China government don't support northern terrorist groups," read one of their posters, in English.翻译:他们的一张英文海报上写道：“我们要求中国政府不要支持北方恐怖组织。”

Junta spokesman Zaw Min Tun later said the protesters were opposed to the insurgents. He did not refer to their call for China not to support the rebels but accused the Western media of trying to destroy Myanmar's relations with China.翻译:军政府发言人佐敏吞后来表示，抗议者反对叛乱分子。他没有提及他们呼吁中国不要支持叛乱分子，而是指责西方媒体试图破坏缅甸与中国的关系。

Reporting by Albee Zhang, Ryan Woo in Beijing, and Reuters staff; Editing by Edmund Klamann, Robert Birsel翻译:Albee 张、Ryan Woo 北京以及路透社工作人员的报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼、罗伯特·比尔塞尔

item.title: 中国对法国、德国、意大利公民实行免签入境政策
item.description:
China will temporarily exempt citizens of France, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Malaysia from needing visas to visit the world's second-largest economy in a bid to give a boost to post-pandemic tourism.翻译:中国将暂时免去法国、德国、意大利、荷兰、西班牙和马来西亚公民前往世界第二大经济体的签证，以提振疫情后的旅游业。

From Dec. 1 to Nov. 30 next year, citizens of those countries entering China for business, tourism, visiting relatives and friends, or transiting for no more than 15 days, will not need a visa, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Friday.翻译:外交部发言人周五表示，从12月1日至明年11月30日，这些国家的公民入境中国商务、旅游、探亲访友或过境不超过15天，将不再需要签证。

China has been taking steps in recent months - including restoring international flight routes - to revive its tourism sector following three years of strict COVID-19 measures that largely shut its borders to the outside world.翻译:近几个月来，中国一直在采取措施，包括恢复国际航线，以重振旅游业，此前三年，中国针对新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 采取了严格的措施，基本上对外界关闭了边境。

The government is also looking to re-establish its image around the world after clashing with many Western countries on various issues including COVID, human rights, Taiwan and trade.翻译:在与许多西方国家在新冠病毒、人权、台湾和贸易等问题上发生冲突后，中国政府还寻求在世界各地重新树立形象。

A recent Pew Research Center survey in 24 countries revealed that views of China were broadly negative, with 67% of adults expressing unfavourable views.翻译:皮尤研究中心最近在 24 个国家进行的一项调查显示，人们对中国的看法普遍持负面态度，67% 的成年人表达了负面看法。

More than half of the respondents said China interfered in the affairs of other countries and did not take into account the interests of others.翻译:超过一半的受访者表示，中国干涉别国事务，不考虑别国利益。

"This decision will facilitate travel to China for many German citizens to an unprecedented extent," Germany's ambassador to China, Patricia Flor, said on the social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter.翻译:德国驻华大使帕特里夏·弗洛（Patricia Flor）在社交媒体平台X（原名Twitter）上表示：“这一决定将为许多德国公民前往中国提供前所未有的便利。”

"We hope that the Chinese government will implement the measures announced today for all EU member states," she said.翻译:“我们希望中国政府为所有欧盟成员国落实今天宣布的措施，”她说。

Visa-free travel to Germany for Chinese nationals would only be possible if all members of the European Schengen Agreement approved, she said.翻译:她说，只有欧洲申根协定所有成员国都批准，中国公民才能免签前往德国。

The head of foreign trade at the German Chamber of Industry and Commerce (DIHK) hailed the announcement of a temporary visa exemption as "an important signal that can boost both tourism and economic exchange".翻译:德国工商会（DIHK）外贸负责人称赞临时免签的宣布是“可以促进旅游业和经济交流的重要信号”。

"Above all, the regulation facilitates the maintenance of German machines, the assurance of quality 'Made in Germany', entrepreneurial exchange and the cultivation of interpersonal contacts," Volker Treier said in an interview with Reuters.翻译:“最重要的是，该法规有利于德国机器的维护、‘德国制造’的质量保证、企业交流和人际交往的培养，”沃尔克·特雷尔在接受路透社采访时表示。

French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna, who is in Beijing, wrote on X: "An excellent new announcement on the occasion of my visit from my counterpart Wang Yi!"翻译:正在北京的法国外长凯瑟琳·科隆纳在X上写道：“在我访问之际，我的外交部长王毅发布了一个非常好的新消息！”

This month, China expanded its visa-free transit policy to 54 countries to include citizens of Norway.翻译:本月，中国将过境免签政策扩大到54个国家，其中包括挪威公民。

In August, China scrapped all COVID test requirements for inbound travellers. It resumed 15-day visa-free entry for citizens of Singapore and Brunei in July.翻译:8月，中国取消了对入境旅客的所有新冠病毒检测要求。 7月恢复对新加坡和文莱公民15天免签证入境。

International flights in and out the country, while recovering more slowly than services on the domestic network, have been picking up.翻译:进出该国的国际航班虽然恢复速度慢于国内网络的服务，但一直在回升。

China's aviation authority said in October that 16,680 weekly flights were expected from November through March, with passenger flights expected to reach 71% of the total four years ago.翻译:中国航空管理局10月表示，预计11月至3月每周航班数量为16,680架次，客运航班量预计将达到四年前总数的71%。

The European Chamber of Commerce in China also said the move would help boost business confidence. "It is a positive that the authorities are taking steps to facilitate people-to-people exchanges," it added.翻译:中国欧盟商会也表示，此举将有助于提振企业信心。声明补充说：“当局正在采取措施促进民间交流，这是积极的。”

Reporting by Joe Cash, Ethan Wang, Ryan Woo and Rene Wagner; Editing by Kim Coghill, Miral Fahmy and Toby Chopra翻译:Joe Cash、Ethan Wang、Ryan Woo 和 Rene Wagner 报道；编辑：Kim Coghill、Miral Fahmy 和 Toby Chopra
item.author: Ethan Wang, Joe Cash

item.title: 王毅：中欧应共同努力，加强稳定的贸易关系
item.description:
Europe should not be afraid of working with China because of competition, and the two sides should work together to enhance the reliability and stability of economic and trade relations, foreign minister Wang Yi said on Friday.翻译:外交部长王毅周五表示，欧洲不应因为竞争而害怕与中国合作，双方应共同努力增强经贸关系的可靠性和稳定性。

European officials have repeatedly vowed to reduce economic dependencies on China in critical sectors - otherwise known as "de-risking" - in the face of what the G7 calls China's "economic coercion".翻译:面对七国集团所谓的中国“经济胁迫”，欧洲官员一再发誓要减少关键领域对中国的经济依赖，也称为“去风险”。

"China's position is clear. We will adhere to our support of Europe's strategic autonomy," Wang said when asked about China's view of its relationship with Europe at a press briefing with his French counterpart in Beijing.翻译:“中方的立场是明确的。我们将坚持支持欧洲的战略自主权，”王毅在北京与法国外长举行的新闻发布会上被问及中方对中欧关系的看法时表示。

French Foreign Minister Catherine Colonna was visiting the Chinese capital, and earlier met Premier Li Qiang with whom she discussed a broad range of topics including rebalancing France's economic relationship with the world's second-largest economy.翻译:法国外交部长凯瑟琳·科隆纳正在访问中国首都，并于早些时候会见了李强总理，双方讨论了广泛的话题，包括重新平衡法国与世界第二大经济体的经济关系。

Colonna said France was committed to dialogue with China, affirming ties after a European Union anti-subsidy probe backed by Paris into Chinese-made electric vehicles was blasted as "protectionist" by Beijing.翻译:科隆纳表示，法国致力于与中国对话，在巴黎支持的欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车进行反补贴调查被北京方面斥为“保护主义”后，法国坚定了与中国的关系。

Her trip is centred on encouraging exchanges between citizens of both countries such as students and tourists, threatened to be overshadowed by the trade issues.翻译:她此行的重点是鼓励学生和游客等两国公民之间的交流，这些交流可能被贸易问题所掩盖。

"We are really committed to dialogue with China," Colonna told Li, adding that she was "honoured" and happy to see him after their Paris meeting in June.翻译:“我们真的致力于与中国对话，”科隆纳告诉李克强，并补充说她很“荣幸”并很高兴在六月巴黎会议后见到他。

Wang said the differing demands of competition and cooperation need not clash.翻译:王说，竞争与合作的不同诉求并不冲突。

"Of course there will be competition in cooperation, but we should not be afraid of cooperation because of competition. The biggest risk we need to get rid of is the uncertainty brought by broad politicisation," Wang said, adding that the dependency most in need of reduction is protectionism.翻译:“合作中当然会有竞争，但我们不应该因为竞争而害怕合作。我们需要摆脱的最大风险是广泛政治化带来的不确定性。”王说，并补充说，最需要的是依赖减少就是保护主义。

"At present, exchanges between China's business circles are resuming in an all-round way and heating up rapidly. We will listen to the voices of the European business community, earnestly solve the problems of investors in China," Wang said in the press briefing with his counterpart.翻译:“当前，中国工商界交流正在全面恢复并迅速升温。我们将倾听欧洲工商界的声音，切实解决在华投资者的问题。”王毅在新闻发布会上表示。与他的对手。

Both foreign ministers agreed to cooperate on a number of fronts.翻译:两国外长同意在多个领域开展合作。

"With China, we are working to find answers to global climate, biodiversity and debt challenges," Colonna wrote in a post on social media platform X.翻译:科隆纳在社交媒体平台 X 上发帖称：“我们正在与中国一起努力寻找全球气候、生物多样性和债务挑战的答案。”

Wang said he hopes to deepen exchanges with France in civil nuclear and aerospace, and explore emerging areas such as education and scientific research.翻译:王毅表示，希望深化与法国在民用核能、航天等领域的交流，探索教育、科研等新兴领域。

The Chinese premier, in his meeting with Colonna earlier, also took an upbeat stance on broader bilateral ties.翻译:中国总理早些时候在会见科隆纳时也对更广泛的双边关系采取了乐观立场。

"Under the strategic leadership of President Xi Jinping and (French) President (Emmanuel) Macron, the relationship between China and France has been developing better and better in all aspects since this year," Li said.翻译:李克强表示，今年以来，在习近平主席和马克龙总统的战略引领下，中法关系各方面发展越来越好。

"Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France, and both of us are sustaining our efforts in the hope that the 60th year would see a big development and a big breakthrough."

CHINA-EU SUMMIT LOOMS

Colonna's trip precedes a visit by the European Commission and Council presidents, Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel, to Beijing in early December for the first in-person summit with President Xi Jinping in four years, after China-EU relations nosedived during the pandemic.翻译:科隆纳此行之前，欧盟委员会和理事会主席乌尔苏拉·冯德莱恩和查尔斯·米歇尔将于 12 月初访问北京，与习近平主席进行四年来的首次面对面峰会，此前中欧关系在疫情期间急转直下。 。

Macron, who met with Xi in China earlier this year, has argued the EU should stop being naive and demand a level playing field with countries like China, and had been pushing the European Commission behind the scenes to launch the probe.翻译:马克龙今年早些时候在中国会见了习近平，他认为欧盟应该停止天真，要求与中国等国家建立公平的竞争环境，并一直在幕后推动欧盟委员会启动调查。

China is France's third-largest trade partner, but French and other European firms are concerned about China's vast trade imbalance with the EU, its opaque legislation on cross-border data transfers and cheap Chinese EVs flooding the European market, threatening domestic carmakers.翻译:中国是法国第三大贸易伙伴，但法国和其他欧洲公司对中国与欧盟巨大的贸易不平衡、跨境数据传输立法不透明以及廉价的中国电动汽车充斥欧洲市场，威胁国内汽车制造商感到担忧。

France is also concerned about Chinese attempts to force French cosmetics companies to share manufacturing secrets with Chinese parties.翻译:法国还对中国试图迫使法国化妆品公司与中方分享制造秘密感到担忧。

France is China's top source of cosmetics and wine imports, according to China's customs agency, with French luxury titans such as LMVH (LVMH.PA) particularly dependent on Chinese consumers. The lack of a strong rebound in luxury demand following China's post-pandemic re-opening has spooked investors.翻译:据中国海关称，法国是中国最大的化妆品和葡萄酒进口来源地，LMVH (LVMH.PA)等法国奢侈品巨头尤其依赖中国消费者。中国疫情后重新开放后奢侈品需求缺乏强劲反弹令投资者感到恐慌。

Xi insisted China welcomes investment from French firms in a telephone call on Monday with Macron, who urged fair treatment for foreign companies in China.翻译:习近平周一在与马克龙的电话中坚称中国欢迎法国公司的投资，马克龙敦促公平对待在华外国公司。

Reporting by Laurie Chen and John Irish; Additional reporting by Dominique Patton, Judy Hua and Ryan Woo; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan, Miral Fahmy and Hugh Lawson翻译:Laurie Chen 和 John Irish 的报道；多米尼克·巴顿 (Dominique Patton)、朱迪·华 (Judy Hua) 和瑞安·吴 (Ryan Woo) 的补充报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；编辑：Raju Gopalakrishnan、Miral Fahmy 和 Hugh Lawson

item.title: 中国称世卫组织询问呼吸道疫情后未发现异常病原体
item.description:
Chinese health authorities have not detected any unusual or novel pathogens and provided the requested data on an increase in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Thursday.翻译:世界卫生组织（WHO）周四表示，中国卫生当局尚未发现任何异常或新型病原体，并提供了所要求的有关呼吸道疾病增加和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的数据。

The WHO had asked China for more information on Wednesday after groups including the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) reported clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children in north China.翻译:在包括新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）在内的组织报告中国北方儿童出现聚集性未确诊肺炎后，世界卫生组织周三要求中国提供更多信息。

As per the rule, China responded to the WHO within 24 hours. The WHO had sought epidemiologic and clinical information as well as laboratory results through the International Health Regulations mechanism.翻译:按照规定，中方将在24小时内向世界卫生组织做出回应。世卫组织已通过《国际卫生条例》机制寻求流行病学和临床信息以及实验室结果。

The data suggests the increase is linked to the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions along with the circulation of known pathogens like mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects younger children and which has circulated since May.翻译:数据表明，感染人数的增加与 COVID-19 限制的解除以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响年幼的儿童，自 5 月份以来一直在传播。

Influenza, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and adenovirus have been in circulation since October.翻译:流感、呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）和腺病毒自十月以来一直在传播。

The agency does not advise against travel and trade as they have been monitoring the situation with authorities.翻译:该机构不建议反对旅行和贸易，因为他们一直在与当局一起监测情况。

No unusual pathogens have been detected in the capital of Beijing and the northeastern province of Liaoning.翻译:首都北京和东北部辽宁省未发现异常病原体。

Chinese authorities from the National Health Commission held a press conference on Nov. 13 to report an increase in incidence of respiratory disease.翻译:11月13日，国家卫健委召开新闻发布会，通报呼吸道疾病发病率上升情况。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central Chinese city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中国中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

The U.N. health agency had also asked China for further information about trends in the circulation of known pathogens and the burden on healthcare systems. The WHO said it was in contact with clinicians and scientists through its existing technical partnerships and networks in China.翻译:联合国卫生机构还要求中国提供有关已知病原体传播趋势和医疗系统负担的进一步信息。世界卫生组织表示，它正在通过其在中国现有的技术合作伙伴关系和网络与临床医生和科学家保持联系。

WHO China said it was "routine" to request information on increases in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children from member states, such as China.翻译:世界卫生组织驻华代表处表示，向中国等成员国索取有关呼吸道疾病增加情况和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的信息是“例行公事”。

The global agency decided to issue a statement on China to share available information, as it received a number of queries about it from media, WHO China said in an emailed statement.翻译:世界卫生组织驻华代表处在一份电子邮件声明中表示，由于收到媒体的一些询问，该全球机构决定发表一份关于中国的声明，以分享现有信息。

The ProMED alert was based on a report by FTV News in Taiwan that came out on Tuesday.翻译:ProMED 警报是基于台湾 FTV News 周二发布的一篇报道。

Undiagnosed pneumonia was not mentioned at last week's press conference, according to a transcript, but one speaker said everyone felt like there had been an increase in respiratory illnesses this year compared with three years ago.翻译:根据一份文字记录，上周的新闻发布会上没有提到未确诊的肺炎，但一位发言者表示，每个人都觉得今年的呼吸道疾病与三年前相比有所增加。

The speaker said that global monitoring for mycoplasma pneumoniae had been at a low over the past three years and outbreaks were cyclical, occurring every three to seven years.

'SEASONAL SURGE'

The rise in respiratory illnesses comes as China braces for its first full winter season since it had lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December. Many other countries saw similar increases in respiratory diseases after easing pandemic measures.翻译:呼吸道疾病的增加正值中国准备迎接自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季。在放松大流行措施后，许多其他国家的呼吸道疾病也出现了类似的增加。

"It is just a relatively large seasonal surge, perhaps partly due to chance and partly because there's a bit of 'immunity debt' from the lesser winter surges in the last three years," said Ben Cowling, an epidemiologist at Hong Kong University.翻译:香港大学流行病学家本·考林表示：“这只是一次相对较大的季节性激增，可能部分是偶然，部分是因为过去三年冬季疫情较少，造成了一些‘免疫债’。”

China's National Health Commission did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国国家卫生健康委员会没有立即回应置评请求。

On Thursday, it published an interview with the state media agency Xinhua in which it advised parents what to do and mentioned that big hospitals were receiving a large number of patients and waiting times were long. It did not comment on the WHO notice.翻译:周四，它发表了接受官方媒体新华社的采访，其中建议家长该怎么做，并提到大医院接收大量患者，等待时间很长。它没有对世界卫生组织的通知发表评论。

Since mid-October, the WHO said northern China had reported an increase in influenza-like illness compared with the same period in the previous three years.翻译:自10月中旬以来，世界卫生组织表示，与前三年同期相比，中国北方报告的流感样疾病有所增加。

It said China had systems in place to capture information on trends in illness incidence and to report that data to platforms such as the Global Influenza Surveillance and Response System.翻译:报告称，中国已建立系统来获取有关疾病发病率趋势的信息，并将这些数据报告给全球流感监测和应对系统等平台。

In recent days, media in cities such as Xian in the northwest have posted videos of hospitals crowded with parents and children awaiting checks.翻译:最近几天，西北西安等城市的媒体发布了医院挤满家长和孩子等待检查的视频。

Some social media users have posted photos of children doing homework while receiving intravenous drips in hospital.翻译:一些社交媒体用户发布了孩子们在医院接受静脉滴注时做作业的照片。

The WHO said that while it was seeking additional information, it recommended that people in China follow measures to reduce the risk of respiratory illness.翻译:世界卫生组织表示，在寻求更多信息的同时，建议中国民众采取措施降低呼吸道疾病的风险。

Measures included vaccination, keeping distance from sick people, staying at home when ill, getting tested and medical care as needed, wearing masks as appropriate, ensuring good ventilation, and regular hand-washing, it said.翻译:报告称，措施包括接种疫苗、与病人保持距离、生病时待在家里、根据需要接受检测和医疗护理、适当佩戴口罩、确保良好的通风和定期洗手。

Reporting By Deena Beasley in Los Angeles, Andrew Silver in Shanghai, Jennifer Rigby in London and Emma Farge in Geneva, Urvi Dugar in Bengaluru; Editing by Robert Birsel, Miyoung Kim and Josie Kao翻译:洛杉矶的 Deena Beasley、上海的 Andrew Silver、伦敦的 Jennifer Rigby 和日内瓦的 Emma Farge、班加罗尔的 Urvi Dugar 报道；编辑：Robert Birsel、Miyoung Kim 和 Josie Kao

item.title: 乌拉圭和中国同意寻求双边贸易协定以及南方共同市场协议
item.description:
Summary:
  • Uruguay wants trade deal between Mercosur, China
  • Mercosur-China deal could pressure Paraguay over Taiwan ties
  • Uruguayan beef exports to China face higher tariffs than Australia
翻译:概括：
  • 乌拉圭希望南方共同市场与中国达成贸易协议
  • 南方共同市场与中国的协议可能会在台湾关系问题上给巴拉圭带来压力
  • 乌拉圭牛肉出口中国面临比澳大利亚更高的关税

Uruguayan President Luis Lacalle Pou and Chinese Premier Li Qiang are keen to keep working on a bilateral free trade agreement as well as pursue one between China and the wider Mercosur trade bloc, according to a joint statement.翻译:根据一份联合声明，乌拉圭总统路易斯·拉卡列·波乌和中国总理李强热衷于继续致力于双边自由贸易协定的制定，并寻求中国与更广泛的南方共同市场贸易集团之间的自由贸易协定。

The statement follows a Thursday meeting in Beijing between the two and comes after China and Uruguay this week upgraded their bilateral relationship to a "comprehensive strategic partnership," elevating Montevideo's ties with Beijing to those of Argentina and Brazil.翻译:该声明是在两国周四在北京举行会议之后发表的，此前中国和乌拉圭本周将双边关系升级为“全面战略伙伴关系”，将蒙得维的亚与北京的关系提升至阿根廷和巴西的关系。

Beijing is seen as particularly interested in an FTA with Mercosur as that could put pressure on Paraguay, the last remaining South American country with ties to Taipei, to rethink its links with Taiwan which China considers part of its territory.翻译:北京被认为对与南方共同市场达成自由贸易协定特别感兴趣，因为这可能会给巴拉圭带来压力，巴拉圭是最后一个与台北有联系的南美国家，要求其重新考虑与台湾的关系，中国认为台湾是其领土的一部分。

The statement said that Uruaguay and China were committed to pursuing a bilateral FTA and noted that a joint feasibility study had been completed.翻译:声明称，乌拉圭和中国致力于建立双边自由贸易协定，并指出联合可行性研究已经完成。

"At the same time, the two sides are willing to promote China-Mercosur FTA talks," it added.翻译:同时，双方愿推动中国-南方共同市场自贸区谈判。”

Lacalle Pou first proposed a bilateral FTA with China in 2021 to secure similar opportunities for its exporters as those enjoyed by Chile, Costa Rica, Ecuador and Peru - countries which have secured tariff-free access to the world's second-largest economy.翻译:Lacalle Pou首次提议于2021年与中国签署双边自由贸易协定，以确保其出口商享有与智利、哥斯达黎加、厄瓜多尔和秘鲁类似的机会，这些国家已获得世界第二大经济体的免关税准入。

"Uruguay is firmly committed to close relations with China and active participation in the Belt and Road Initiative (BRI)," Lacalle Pou said, according to a readout of the meeting in Chinese state media.翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，拉卡勒·鲍表示：“乌拉圭坚定致力于与中国保持密切关系，并积极参与‘一带一路’倡议。”

Uruguay was also "willing to... accelerate establishing an FTA between Uruguay, Mercosur and China," Chinese media quoted him as saying.翻译:中国媒体援引他的话说，乌拉圭也“愿意……加速乌拉圭、南方共同市场和中国之间建立自由贸易协定”。

But Uruguay faces stiff opposition from fellow Mercosur members Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay who want their bloc to settle an FTA with Europe instead.翻译:但乌拉圭面临南方共同市场其他成员国阿根廷、巴西和巴拉圭的强烈反对，他们希望自己的集团与欧洲达成自由贸易协定。

Last November, they warned they could take "measures" against Uruguay if it forged ahead with its plans to unilaterally negotiate an FTA with China.翻译:去年11月，他们警告说，如果乌拉圭继续推进与中国单方面谈判自由贸易协定的计划，他们可能会对乌拉圭采取“措施”。

Uruguay has also applied to join a major trans-Pacific free trade pact that China also aspires to join, but both Montevideo and Beijing must overcome significant political hurdles before that is possible.翻译:乌拉圭还申请加入一项重要的跨太平洋自由贸易协定，中国也渴望加入，但蒙得维的亚和北京都必须克服重大政治障碍才能实现这一目标。

Li was quoted as saying that China and Uruguay should take the signing of Belt and Road Initiative cooperation documents as an opportunity to promote a continuing increase in bilateral trade.翻译:李克强表示，中乌应以签署“一带一路”合作文件为契机，推动双边贸易持续增长。

China accounted for 27% of Uruguay's exports in 2022, United Nations Comtrade data shows.翻译:联合国商品贸易统计数据显示，2022年中国占乌拉圭出口的27%。

At present, Uruguayan beef, which constituted two-thirds of those exports to China, is subject to a 12% tariff.翻译:目前，占对华出口量三分之二的乌拉圭牛肉需缴纳12%的关税。

By comparison, other major beef exporters Australia and New Zealand, which have FTAs with China, pay tariffs at 3.3% and 0%.翻译:相比之下，与中国签订自由贸易协定的其他主要牛肉出口国澳大利亚和新西兰的关税分别为3.3%和0%。

Uruguay came close to signing an FTA with the United States in 2006, but its government at the time eventually rejected the deal over fears of expulsion from Mercosur if it did so.翻译:2006年，乌拉圭差点与美国签署自由贸易协定，但当时的政府最终拒绝了该协议，因为担心这样做会被逐出南方共同市场。

According to a study conducted by the National Meat Institute of Uruguay in 2021, if China signs an FTA with Uruguay, the meat industry can implement a 0% preferential tariff, which will reduce tariffs by $150 million.翻译:乌拉圭国家肉类研究所2021年的一项研究显示，如果中国与乌拉圭签署自由贸易协定，肉类行业可以实施0%的优惠关税，这将减少1.5亿美元的关税。
